LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_Merchant.label: merchant
LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_Merchant.description: A welcoming and charismatic, though somewhat cutthroat trader, specializes in establishing mercantile routes with other colonies. Can signal for a random friendly faction trade caravan to make a detour directly to the colony every 5 days. Also receives a small bonus to trading prices through sheer charisma.
